text:
Today I'm gonna share with you what I
believe to be the hands-down best career (the best recession proof career)

to pursue right now especially
considering what's going on in the world

around us this is a career that I think
will do extremely well in this recession

it's called digital marketing for those
of you that don't know what digital

marketing is it's basically when you
help a company grow their online

presence and do more business online
technically I am a digital marketer

myself as I know how to grow on YouTube
extremely well but digital marketing

also involves things like running ads on
Facebook or getting websites ranked

higher on Google today I want to share a
few four reasons why this career path is

something you should seriously consider
because I genuinely believe that this is

the safest and most profitable career
path to pursue right now so I suggest

you listen carefully the first reason
why digital marketing is the best career

path to consider right now is because
the demand is skyrocketing the recent

lock downs and social distancing rules
have been put into place worldwide have

basically forced all non-essential
businesses to close their physical

locations and move online and the only
people who know how to actually grow

online bring customers into the store
and convince them to buy a product or

service our digital marketers see the
large majority of business owners are

older and they simply do not have enough
experience using the internet and the

popular social media platforms to know
what they're doing

so they end up looking for someone to
manage all of their marketing online for

them you can see just how many new jobs
are being created in this field by going

onto LinkedIn and typing in digital
marketing into the job search bar and as

you can see in just the last week there
were over 10,000 new positions available

worldwide and you can expect this number
to remain relatively high as more and

more businesses realize that they need a
digital marketer in order to compete

with everyone else the second reason why
digital marketing is so amazing is

because there is tremendous room for
growth see over time as you work with

more and more companies and your track
record improves you will be able to

charge significantly more for example I
specialize in YouTube digital marketing

and companies around the world are
to pay me $500 per hour just to help

them grow their channels this stream of
income alone has made me tens of

thousands of dollars every year and all
I do is jump on the phone with them once

a week and tell them what I think they
should do next with their Channel that's

it that's literally all I do now you
might be thinking well improvement pill

that's because you have millions of
subscribers there's no way I could

charge that much and that's where you're
mistaken there are tons of digital

marketing consultants that charge
equally if not more than what I do and

almost all of them have less of a
following but what they do have is a

good track record let's say for example
you become a digital marketer and you

get hired at a company and within six
months you're able to raise their

revenue by 25% that in itself is huge
the moment you have a case study like

this you automatically have the ability
to negotiate for a higher pay it's

extremely easy for you to ask for a
raise because you're the one that's

bringing in the money they need you
you'll also get higher job offers from

other companies because you actually
have successful case studies that you

can use to showcase your skills as
compared to most other digital marketers

out there and you're not limited to only
working for a single company I know

several people in the digital marketing
world that worked with a company for a

few years got the experience and track
record they needed and eventually

started their own agencies where they
catered to multiple companies all of

which paid them thousands of dollars
every single month to manage their

growth online it's not uncommon for a
digital marketing agency to bring in

hundreds of thousands of dollars every
single year so if you're someone with an

entrepreneurial spirit who wants to
eventually own their own business and be

their own boss this is one of the best
paths you could go down now before

telling you the final two reasons why I
love digital marketing so much I want to

quickly take a second and talk to you
about how you can get started first

things first if you're interested in
going down this career path you need to

be able to get a job in the field right
now more than ever you need to have a

steady source of income which is why I'm
partnering up with a good friend of mine

Saif Himes who's been running a unique
program designed to help people find

jobs as digital marketers he's helped
hundreds of people get hired over the

course of the last couple of years just
look at some of these testimonials that

he got even
during this whole virus situation these

are people that managed to get hired
while the unemployment rate was

skyrocketing around the world if you are
interested in this career path I suggest

you check out is free four-part training
series where he goes over everything you

need to know about this field in more
detail you can find it in the comments

down below and quick little disclaimer I
am an affiliate for this program which

means if you go through SEFs free
training and decide to sign up for it I

will be compensated but honestly from
the bottom of my heart out of all the

things I've ever promoted on this
channel other than my own courses this

program is the one that has generated
the most success stories so I truly

believe in it now back to the topic at
hand the third reason why digital

marketing is the best career path to go
down is because you get to use other

people's money to develop your skills
when I first tried entering the world of

online business I was basically forced
to learn how to be a digital marketer

all by myself
I built website after website bought ad

after ad course after course and paid
for all of it out of my own pocket and

this led me to quickly burn through my
savings and I actually had to get a

part-time job just to keep myself afloat
on the other hand when you enter the

world of digital marketing by getting
hired and working for another company

they give you a budget to work with so
you basically get to hone your skills

and experiment with new marketing
strategies with someone else's money now

of course this doesn't mean you can just
waste their money they do expect some

results after a couple of months but
this completely eliminates the risk you

would take on if you try to learn
digital marketing all on your own and

the great thing is that most companies
understand that you won't get results

within the first month that's just sort
of how marketing works even outside of

the digital world it takes a while for
things to ramp up so you'll be given the

time and the resources to figure things
out and finally the fourth and final

reason why digital marketing is the best
career path to go down is because it can

be done a hundred percent remotely by
anyone regardless of where you're from

see the thing about the current world
situation is that we don't really know

when things will return to normal
if it ever does return to normal social

distancing might be a thing for years to
come which means that certain career

paths will not be safe to pursue certain
occupations that require you to show up

physically to work are not
as safe and sound as they were before so

it's best to pursue something that can
be done a hundred percent remotely from

home and digital marketing is perfect
for this because everything you do as a

digital marketer is done online which
means you can work from wherever you

want you can live in another country and
enjoy better weather explore new

cultures and take advantage of currency
conversions I'm currently living in

Vietnam and the cost of living here is
about three to four times more

affordable than in the States which
basically means that I'm three times

richer this allows me to live in a nice
apartment that comes with free cleaning

twice a week for literally a third of
what it would cost me in New York City I

live good I eat good I get to enjoy
perfect weather every day all because I

have a job that allows me to work a
hundred percent remotely and digital

marketing offers the same benefits and
that's it guys I hope this video showed

you why I'm so passionate about this
field digital marketing is one of the

main reasons why my business is a
success and it's given me the life of my

dreams if you feel like this career path
might be the one for you go check out

Seth's free four-part training series in
the description box below
besides that guys stay tuned
